name: sic-landing-pages
description: Accessible Landing Pages for Sigma Clinic with SCSS, JS, HTML

scripts.build: npm-run-all scss:build js:build copy:css copy:js copy:map
scripts.scss:build-nosource: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && postcss dist/style.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style.css
scripts.scss:build: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/style.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style.css
